%1$s is a very easy to use navigation app that simply points an arrow to your set destination. When you are at your preferred destination (e.g. at home, at your camp site or at your parked car), choose \"Set current location\" and the arrow will always point to that destination.

This app does not store your saved destination anywhere else but locally on your device and NEVER uploads it anywhere. If you clear the apps data or delete the app, your set destination is gone. E.g. crashes and anonymous usage data can however be uploaded to help in improving the app.
